comment: She was alright at the beginning, then she really started to get on my last nerves. I know that we are supposed to learn the basics, but don't be condescending. Just because you have a PhD. we do know more than you. She sure can beat a dead horse and is very talkative about nothing that has to do with nothing. Don't try to tell her something else..

She was nice about halfway throughout the semester then she turned completely mean...she gave out plagiarism slips to almost half of the class for not citing something correctly on an assignment that she originally said did not need to be cited.  It brought down all of those people's grades.

Dr. Myers is a great professor. She has the knowledge to explain something more than one way, which is helpful if one method is confusing and ambiguous. Her office door and is always open if your question(s) are too specific and require more time to explain. Tests are very straight forward; either you know the material or you don't.
Excellant teacher.  Very good at describing concepts needed for programming.  Nice and willing to beat a dead horse just so everyone will understand the material.  Highly recommend.

Dr. Myers is the best teacher!!! I would take her for every class I can, in fact I have. I recommend her highly! She really teaches the content before testing. She does like to challenge students just enough, but nothing that you haven't learned from her during class. She is also very interesting!
never took her, but she is so helpful and the nicest ever
the best teacher I have ever had
